Predicts body temperature (operative environmental temperature) of a mussel in °C.

Source: R/biophysmodel_Mussel.R
Tb_mussel.Rd

Predicts body temperature of a mussel in °C. Implements a steady‐state model, which assumes unchanging environmental conditions. Based on Helmuth 1998, INTERTIDAL MUSSEL MICROCLIMATES: PREDICTING THE BODY TEMPERATURE OF A SESSILE INVERTEBRATE

Tb_mussel(L, H, T_a, T_g, S, k_d, u, psi, evap = FALSE, cl, group = "solitary")

Arguments

L

mussel length (anterior/posterior axis) (m)
H

mussel height (dorsal/ventral axis) (m), reasonable to assume 0.5*L
T_a

air temperature (°C)
T_g

ground temperature (°C)
S

direct solar flux density (W/m2)
k_d

diffuse fraction, proportion of solar radiation that is diffuse
u

wind speed (m/s)
psi

solar zenith angle (degrees): can be calculated from zenith_angle function
evap

Are mussels gaping to evaporatively cool? TRUE of FALSE (default), If TRUE, assumes constant mass loss rate of 5 percent of initial body mass per hour
cl

fraction of the sky covered by cloud
group

options are "aggregated": mussels living in beds, "solitary": mussels individuals, anterior or posterior end facing upwind, and "solitary_valve": solitary individuals, valve facing upwind

Value

predicted body temperature (°C)

Details

Predicts body temperature of a mussel in °C.

See also

Other biophysical models: Free_or_forced_convection(), Grashof_number_Gates(), Grashof_number(), Nu_from_Gr(), Nu_from_Re(), Nusselt_number(), Prandtl_number(), Qconduction_animal(), Qconduction_substrate(), Qconvection(), Qemitted_thermal_radiation(), Qevaporation(), Qmetabolism_from_mass_temp(), Qmetabolism_from_mass(), Qnet_Gates(), Qradiation_absorbed(), Qthermal_radiation_absorbed(), Reynolds_number(), Tb_CampbellNorman(), Tb_Fei(), Tb_Gates(), Tb_butterfly(), Tb_grasshopper(), Tb_limpetBH(), Tb_limpet(), Tb_lizard(), Tb_salamander_humid(), Tb_snail(), Tbed_mussel(), Tsoil(), actual_vapor_pressure(), boundary_layer_resistance(), external_resistance_to_water_vapor_transfer(), heat_transfer_coefficient_approximation(), heat_transfer_coefficient_simple(), heat_transfer_coefficient(), saturation_vapor_pressure(), saturation_water_vapor_pressure()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
Tb_mussel(
  L = 0.1, 
  H = 0.05, 
  T_a = 25, 
  T_g = 30, 
  S=500, 
  k_d=0.2, 
  u = 2, 
  psi = 30, 
  evap = FALSE, 
  cl = 0.5, 
  group = "solitary")
}
